summary.span: 提供从数据源读取数据行的只进流的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 关闭 对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任意给定时间，都可以打开多个。More than one can be open at any given time. > [!CAUTION] > 不要对 `Close` `Dispose` 连接、或 `DataReader` 类的方法中的任何其他托管对象调用或 `Finalize` 。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a connection, a `DataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，只应释放类直接拥有的非托管资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [垃圾回收](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/).

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果不是位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括隐藏的字段。Includes hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields. 执行不返回行的查询后，将 返回0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

exception.span: 没有到数据源的当前连接。

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 字段中读取操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to begin.

param.name: buffer2
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: 开始写操作位置的索引。

span.span: The index where is to begin the write operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 将字节流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 在大多数情况下，这是字段的确切长度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 但是，如果已 `GetBytes` 使用从字段获取字节，则返回的数字可能小于字段的实际长度。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 例如，如果 正在将大数据结构读入缓冲区，则可能会出现这种情况。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅的 `SequentialAccess` 设置 。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果传递的缓冲区为空值，则 返回字段的长度（以字节为单位）。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管可以使用此方法来检索显式枚举器，但在支持 foreach 构造的语言中，直接使用循环构造来循环访问数据读取器中的行更为简单。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit enumerator, in languages that support a foreach construct, it's simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

param.name: values
param.span: 将特性列复制到的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type into which to copy the attribute columns.

summary.span: 获取以 Oracle 格式表示的当前行中所有的特性列。

span.span: Gets all the attribute columns in the current row in Oracle format.

returns.span: 数组中 的实例的数目。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，该 方法提供了一种有效的方法来检索所有列，而不是单独检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 可以传递一个 数组，该数组包含的列数少于所产生行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 只有数组保存的数据量 会复制到数组中。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 还可以传递 其长度大于结果行中所含列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

override this.GetSchemaTable : unit -> System.Data.DataTable

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它描述 OracleDataReader 的列元数据。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the OracleDataReader.

returns.span: 一个描述列元数据的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法按以下顺序返回有关每个列的元数据：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader Column|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnNameColumnName|列的名称;这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果无法确定列名，则返回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映当前视图或命令文本中列的最新命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 NULL 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|列中值的最大可能长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果 是数值数据类型，则这是列的最大精度。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精度取决于该列的定义。The precision depends on the definition of the column. `Float``Double`Oracle 中的数据类型和数据类型是二进制精度。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary precision.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果 是数值数据类型，则为小数点右侧的位数。If is a numeric data type, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. `Float``Double`Oracle 中的数据类型为二进制小数位数。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary scale.| |数据类型DataType|映射到的公共语言运行时类型 。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB) 包含非常长的数据。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 值，则为;否则为 `false` 。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value; otherwise, `false`. 即使无法将列设置为 NULL 值，列也可以包含 NULL 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`：基表中没有两行-返回的表在 此列中可能具有相同的值。`true`: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in -can have the same value in this column. **IsUnique** `true` 如果列本身构成键，或者存在仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 类型的约束，则可保证 IsUnique 为。**IsUnique** is guaranteed to be `true` if the column constitutes a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`：列可以包含基表中的重复值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此列的默认值为 false。The default for this column is false.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`：列是行集中的一组列，这些列汇集在一起，以唯一标识行。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 将 **IsKey** 设置为 true 的一组列必须唯一地标识行集中的一行。The set of columns with **IsKey** set to true must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 不要求这组列是最小组列。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 此组列可能从一个基表主键、唯一约束或唯一索引生成。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index. `false`：唯一标识行不需要此列。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|包含该列的数据存储区中的表或视图的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基表名称，则为 NULL 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 如果使用了别名，则该名称可能不同于列名称 **返回的列** 名称。This might be different than the column name returned in the **ColumnName** column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基列名称，或者如果行集列派生，但与数据存储区中的列不完全相同，则为 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含该列的数据存储区中架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本架构名称，则为 NULL 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| 为结果集中的每一列返回一行。A row is returned for every column in the results set. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保 metadata 列返回正确的信息，必须在 `behavior` 参数设置为的情况下调用 `KeyInfo` 。To ensure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否则，架构表中的某些列可能返回默认值、null 值或不正确的数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

span.span: Retrieving Database Schema Information (ADO.NET)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. 此方法返回的值可能是从 Oracle 的数字数据类型转换为 .NET Decimal 类型的结果。The value returned by this method might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type. 如果值太大而无法存储在 .NET Decimal 中，此方法将引发一个 溢出异常的。If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an that is an overflow exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，该 方法提供了一种有效的方法来检索所有列，而不是单独检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 可以传递一个 数组，该数组包含的列数少于所产生行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 只有数组保存的数据量 会复制到数组中。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 还可以传递 其长度大于结果行中所含列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. 在数组中返回的值 可能是从 Oracle 的数字数据类型转换为 .Net Decimal 类型的结果。The value returned in the array might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type. 如果值太大而无法存储在 .NET Decimal 中，此方法将引发一个 溢出异常的。If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an that is an overflow exception.
